channel.title: The Complete List of IT Business Terms And Their Definitions on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The Complete List of IT Business Terms And Their Definitions on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Back End System?
item.description: A back-end system serves as the backbone of any digital service or application, working diligently behind the scenes to power the functionalities we interact with.

item.title: What is a Digital Twin?
item.description: Simply put, a digital twin refers to a virtual representation of a real-world entity or system.
